title.narrative: Response to conflict emergency in Moyale

description.narrative:
In Ethiopia CAFOD works together with Tr?caire and SCIAF through a Joint Programme (JP). All three agencies are members of Caritas Internationalis, and are the official relief and development agencies of the Catholic Church in England and Wales (CAFOD), Scotland (SCIAF) and Ireland (Tr?caire). CST is managing different livelihood and humanitarian project in Borena in collaboration local implementing NGOs. CIFA is also one of the Borena partner to CST and currently implementing 18 months recover project in Moyale which is funded by DEC.
The current project is designed to respond to conflict crisis in Moyale to address the same DEC project beneficiaries that are affected by the conflict. The project beneficiaries will be displaced communities because of the conflict damage. Therefore, the proposed intervention envisages increasing resettled communities in Moyale Woreda opportunities to access Non Food Items, and improve water access which is the major factor for the security situation in the area. The water scheme construction is done through CFW program to address the food need of affected community. .
